conbody.p: (d) Dispose of the property identified in FAR Subpart 45.602-2(d) in accordance with DOD Instruction 4161.02, Accountability and Management of Government Contract Property , dated April 27, 2012, and DOD Manual 4160.21, Volume 2, Defense Materiel Disposition: Property Disposal and Reclamation , dated October 22, 2015.
